A psalm written by David for the choir director, asking God to help David
Yahweh, come quickly to help me!
Humble those who are happy about my troubles/difficulties, and cause them to be disgraced/ashamed.
Chase away those who are trying to kill me.
I hope/desire that you will cause them to become dismayed and ashamed
I hope/desire that all those who go to
I want those who love you because you saved them to shout repeatedly [HYP],
As for me, I am poor and needy [DOU];
God, come quickly to help me!
Yahweh, you are the one who saves and helps me,
